user_request: View the shopping cart on amazon. Search for razer nari on amazon, select the first entry, and add it to the cart.
last_action: click on the "Add to Cart" button located at the middle and lower middle part of the screen.
reflect_result: By clicking on the "Add to Cart" button, the Razer Nari headset has been successfully added to your shopping cart. This is a direct consequence of the action and brings you closer to completing your request of adding the product to the cart on Amazon. Now, you can proceed to view your cart to confirm the addition of the headset. This action has made progress toward your goal.
